LUDOSimulator
Interface LUDOPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AggressiveLUDOPlayer, FifoLUDOPlayer, ManualLUDOPlayer, PacifisticLUDOPlayer, RandomLUDOPlayer, SemiSmartLUDOPlayer
public interface LUDOPlayer

Interface which any automatic ludo player must implement.

Version:
0.9
Author:
David Johan Christensen

Method Summary
 void play()
          The play() method is called each time it is the players turn to roll the dice and play.
 

Method Detail

play

void play()
The play() method is called each time it is the players turn to roll the dice and play. See example players for inspiration.
